task_description: Fix TypeError in TokoBot\BotHandlers\GenericBotHandler::handle(): Return value must be of type ?Longman\TelegramBot\Entities\ServerResponse, bool returned.

current_step.name: handle() method modified
current_step.description: Modified handle() method in GenericBotHandler.php to ensure all execution paths return ?ServerResponse.

next_steps: Request user to trigger the error again.
assumptions_made: The error is due to an implicit boolean return from handle() method.
decisions_made: Restructure handle() method to ensure explicit ServerResponse return in all paths.
